summary: This is just a Retex of the Dwarven Shield (Including new normal maps) - It looks old and worn out.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a Retex of the Dwarven Shield. I really like the Dwarven Armor Set, espacially the Shield, but in my opinion it is to \"clear\" (like the Ebony Shield too). I decided to make an old and worn out looking Version of the Shield, and after hours of \"work\" i just made it :) 

This is one of my first mods. It was a personal mod, but since it took me hours to finish, i decided to share it with you. Maybe iÂ´ll make some other \"worn out\" Mods to some shields, let me know what you think about this one.

Installation :

Just copy the files into your Skirim Data Folder.
e.g. skyrim folder/Data/

To uninstall just delete them.
author: zappoo
